---
category: news
title: "Honeybee brains could bring AI breakthrough, say Sheffield experts"
excerpt: "Honeybees are believed to excel when it comes to quick decision-making, with brains only the size of a sesame seed, University of Sheffield scientists say. The experts examined how bees decide which flowers to explore for nectar. Study leader Dr HaDi MaBouDi said the aim was to develop skilled machines \"that can think like bees\"."
